title: WebOps platform Pantheon defends hosting “hate groups” as developers quit
description: Developers quit Pantheon over its stance on hosting SPLC-designated hate groups.

title: Raw milk from farm with no electricity sparks outbreak that nearly killed baby
description: Raw milk is dangerous for everyone, but especially younger children.

title: Judge slams Tesla for claiming Musk quotes captured on video may be deepfakes
description: Court will likely require Musk deposition in Tesla Autopilot wrongful death case.

title: Massive West Nile Virus outbreak in Arizona shattered records, killed 101
description: The cause is unclear, but climate change and the pandemic likely played roles.

title: Scientists sequenced the genome of Balto, famous sled dog of 1925 “Serum Run”
description: Balto was just part Siberian husky and, contrary to popular legend, not part wolf.

title: Samsung makes its stunning 95 percent profit drop official for Q1 2023
description: A glut of memory chips leaves Samsung with its lowest profits since 2009.

title: Super Smash Bros. retro demake puts Wi-Fi into an NES cartridge
description: 8-bit love letter to Super Smash Bros. reaches Kickstarter goal within 48 hours.

title: Magna’s new rearview mirror cleverly integrates a driver-monitoring system
description: It will debut in Europe next year and in the US in 2025.

title: UK government says the Nintendo Switch can’t handle Call of Duty
description: Any port wouldn't match PlayStation/Xbox "in terms of quality of gameplay and content."

title: As sea levels rise, the East Coast is also sinking
description: Coastal lands are subsiding and losing elevation, making rising seas all the worse.

title: Apple Watch buying guide: Which wearable is best for you?
description: The Apple Watch Ultra's launch shook things up, but you probably don't need it.
